lines.text: This is really a nice spot! A beautiful layout, I calls it. Where's the gymnasium, boys?
Hey, what's 'e matter wit' you?
There's a fly annoyin' me.
Point 'im out to me and I'll moider 'im.
Hey, you shouldn't have socked him.
I was jus' gettin' de kinks outta my arm, dat's all. Now if I can get a little road work in the mornin'...
I think that can be arranged very nicely.

[after Allen leaves]
Ya know, I don't like the way he said that.
I think this camp is going to be the means of you finding yourself.
Go on. I ain't even lost.

[to Danny, after catching sight of Elaine]
Wait a minute, son. Got a little business to do out here.
Wait a minute. You know women and fightin' don't mix.
Who says anything about fightin' wit' her?
Hey, this is sure a lotta country to be all in one place, ain't it?
Men are doing great things here - men who, just a few years ago, were boys like you.
Hey, cut it out, will ya, babe? It ain't what I came here to talk about.
No? What are your ideas?
Well, I, uh... ah...

[watching Muggs get pounded in his first professional fight]
I can't let a boy take a beatin' like that.
Let HIM be the judge of that.
Here we go again, boys.
